attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that every member of the Haringey council who is found to be guilty of not stopping his abuse should be sacked and loose their pensions.We feel the head of Childrens services Sharon Shoesmith should be sacked and loose her pension first.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
